verses.roman:
tāhā ke kahite pāre kṣudra jīva hañā
dig-daraśana kailuṅ muñi sūtra kariyā

synonyms: tāhā—that; ke kahite pāre—who can describe; kṣudra—very little; jīva hañā—being a conditioned soul; dik-daraśana kailuṅ—have simply made an indication; muñi—I; sūtra kariyā—in codes.
translation: What ordinary living being can describe the pastimes of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu? I have only indicated the general direction in the form of codes.
